message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I'll be able to match this price again.

I'm interested in the product, but $950000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $875000. I think that's a fair price considering the value I've seen in similar products. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I have to say that I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm counteroffering at $925000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it will bring to you. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $925000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $900000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $900000 is your top limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $915000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more counteroffer, Alice. However, $915000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $910000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $910000 is your final offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'm offering the product to you for $912500. This is as close as I can get to your offer without sacrificing my own profit margins. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.
